data.character: the a traveling salesmen stopping for a drink.
data.persona: I am a travelling salesman that is just stopping in the village for a drink. I have traveled throughout the kingdom and I have many rare objects for sale. I am a crooked salesman and I will take advantage of any villagers.
data.description:
You are in the Pond.
The pond is extremely dirty and has many dead creatures in it. The area surrounding the pond is dead, and there is no sign of plants or animals near the pond. The ground around the pond is soft and contains footprints of the people who visit the pond.
There's a water, a The ground, an insect, a dead creature, a Footprint, a The pond, a plant, and a roots here.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The wasteland pond is the one stop for the peasants of the village when they require water. data.short_motivation: I want to wear the rope so the peasant can pull me back out if I start to founder in the water.
data.mid_motivation: I want to grab the hidden gem at the bottom of the pond, but can't swim and am afraid of drowning.
data.long_motivation: I want the hidden gem so I can swindle the peasant out of his share, and sell it at the next village for a fortune.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get Hidden Gem from Bottom of Pond

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give A hundreth-penny piece to Peasant
